Documentary Series

Long-form visual storytelling that dives deep into complex subjects and human experiences.

The Last Frontier

6-part series for National Geographic • 2023

An Emmy-winning exploration of remote communities adapting to climate change in the Arctic Circle.

View Project

Urban Migrations

4-part series for PBS • 2021

Following the journeys of families relocating to megacities across the developing world.

View Project

The Artisan's Way

3-part series for BBC • 2020

Documenting traditional craftspeople fighting to preserve ancient techniques in a modern world.
